message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $950,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but I can't accept anything below $1,050,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, I've given it some thought and I'm willing to go up to $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
